General.Name: Zaklady Urzadzen Komputerowych ELZAB S.A
General.Description: Zaklady Urzadzen Komputerowych ELZAB S.A. engages in the projection, production, and distribution of a range of fiscal cash registers, devices, and systems for points of sales, and peripherals and accessories for sales registering and managing in Poland. The company offers mobile cash registers, small and medium-sized cash registers, system cash registers, self-checkouts, mobile printers, and store printers; POS computers, touch screens, and software; and price checkers, price checker with printers, data collectors, label printers, plastic card printers, and barcode scanners. It also provides electronic scales, including non-calculating, calculating, labelling, weighbridges, and industrial products, as well as for mounting in the countertop; paper rolls for cash registers and printers, thermal labels for scales, thermal transfer labels for printers, thermal transfer tapes, and other products; receipt printers; cash and flip top drawers, as well as their accessories; and multiplexers, converters, interfaces, adapters, scales accessories, cases and bags for cash registers, keyboard covers, labellers, and other accessories. In addition, the company offers professional and advisory services for managing the back-office, and sale of merchandises and services, as well as warranty and after warranty services; delivery and installation of cash registers and other equipment; integration of merchandises, and services retail sales registering systems; and training in the range of sales service. The company also exports its products to Hungary, Slovakia, and Greece. The company is based in Zabrze, Poland. Zaklady Urzadzen Komputerowych ELZAB S.A. is a subsidiary of Comp S.A.

2.Name: Mr. Andrzej  Wawer
2.Title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board & Member of Supervisory Board
